title: Patch Notes
content: intended, not Thunder. The Absolute Consumption condition no longer stacks. Fixed the Icy Cloud formed via Wall of Ice dealing 5d6 instead of 10d6. Fixed the Slayer's default attack being Relentless Lunge instead of Slay. Ghouls and ghasts should no longer be able to paralyse drow characters. Updated Wild Strike so that it can work with the War Priest extra attack. The 'Fierce Perilous Stakes' Illithid Power can now only be targeted at allies, as specified in the tooltip.
